## Collections.Utils.KeyValueValidators.validateElement() method

Validates a supplied unknown as a valid key-value pair.

**Signature:**

```typescript
validateElement(element: unknown): DetailedResult<KeyValueEntry<TK, TV>, ResultMapResultDetail>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

element


</td><td>

unknown


</td><td>

The unknown to be validated.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[DetailedResult](./ts-utils.detailedresult.md)<!-- -->&lt;[KeyValueEntry](./ts-utils.collections.keyvalueentry.md)<!-- -->&lt;TK, TV&gt;, [ResultMapResultDetail](./ts-utils.collections.resultmapresultdetail.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the validated key-value pair and 'success' detail if the element is valid, or `Failure` with an error message and 'invalid-key' or 'invalid-value' detail if the element is invalid
